name.ja: <ruby>混沌変幻<rt>カオス・ファンタズム</rt></ruby>

text.en: Target 2 of your banished monsters that have a Level (1 LIGHT Tuner and 1 Level 8 or lower DARK non-Tuner); return both to the GY, then Special Summon 1 LIGHT or DARK Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck whose Level equals those monsters' total Levels.
